schema:creator: Gibson, Charis
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ Over distance learning our family used Coach Dad as the PE instructor. He was able to play soccer on his lunch breaks during COVID-19 because he was working from home. We used the park at the end of our street Covell Park in the North Davis Greenbelt. Shelter in Place time playing with Dad was the inspiration for this Acrylic Painting.  
 __Participant age:__ 12  
 __Category:__  Kids Age 12-14 (drawings/paintings only)
schema:name: Soccer in the Sun
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
